subject: Soccer
World Cup 2014 (Soccer)
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: A third of the 32 national team managers in this year’s World Cup have parted ways with their federations. That is par for the course, except in Germany.
snippet: A third of the 32 national team managers in this year’s World Cup have parted ways with their federations. That is par for the course, except in Germany.
